ComicInfo.Title: Return to New York, Book One
ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Color Classics
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Mirage black-and-white classic presented in all-new full color! In “Return to New York, Book One”, Raphael has had enough of hiding out in Northampton. After a tough scuffle with his brothers, he soon finds himself back in New York City… and in deep trouble with the Foot Clan! Alone and outnumbered, will Raph be able to survive his first night back in town without his brothers? Find out in this classic TMNT tale!
TMNT #19 (Mirage, Vol. 1), now in full-color!
